duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop complex applications for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
Ensure data quality of the warehouse and data marts.
Plan and conduct ETL unit and development tests; monitor results and take corrective actions.
Perform basic and advanced transformations in Informatica Power Center independently.
Tune performance of SQLs and handle huge volumes of data.
Diagnose problem areas and provide solutions and workarounds.
Build, maintain, and enhance all objects/packages/functions in PL/SQL to support application processes.
Translate transformation and movement requirements into functional requirements and mapping designs.
Design automation processes to control data access, transformation, and movement.
Ensure source data availability and update accessibility, data integrity, restart ability, and error handling.
Participate in the overall development process via architecture guidance, design and code reviews, and estimation and planning assistance.
Document and troubleshoot problems, and effectively communicate with business and technical team members at all levels.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
